pkgmetadata.longdescription: A highly customisable, open source server software for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition written in PHP A powerful plugin API, which allows you to extend and customize your server far more easily and extensively than any competing server implementations, including the official vanilla server. Multi-world support, allowing you to offer a more varied game experience to players without transferring them to other server nodes. Performance fit to hold 100+ players. PocketMine-MP has the longest and best track record of any custom server for compatibility with new Minecraft versions.
